article_title: 'No one should mourn death of Sinwar,' says Starmer.
sentence: UK  Prime  Minister  Keir  Starmer  says  "no  one  should  mourn  the  death  of  Hamas  leader  (Yahya)  Sinwar"  Speaking  in  Berlin,  Starmer  says:  "On  his  hands  is  the  blood  of  innocent  Israelis,  killed  on  7  October  and  over  years  of  terror.
